name: fly through
desc: The fly_through module facilitates controlling the Viewer or creating an animation in which the view follows a complex 3D path on, through, or around your model.

properties.name: View Position
properties.desc: The View Position allows the user to determine where the view will be placed along the input path.

properties.name: Force Perspective
properties.desc: The Force Perspective toggle will cause the Viewer connect to the fly_though module to be put into perspective mode every time the module is run.

properties.name: Field Of View
properties.desc: Field of View is a slider that sets the total included angle (in degrees) of the camera lens used to see the scene. and perspective is based on the concept of a lens angle. Larger angles have a wider field of view.

properties.name: Scale
properties.desc: The Scale slider moves the camera closer or farther away from the point of interest along the path.

properties.name: Look Down Angle
properties.desc: The Look Down Angle slider controls the angle of the camera above or below the path.

properties.name: Position
properties.desc: The Position slider gives the percentage along a line to use for view positioning.

properties.name: Position Animation
properties.desc: The Position Animation controls the movement (or driving) of the view along the line.

properties.name: Step Size
properties.desc: The Step Size value specifies a value for the increment for advancement when stepping or running.

properties.name: Date Component
properties.desc: The Date Component allows the user to select which data to use when positioning the view by time data.

properties.name: Date And Time
properties.desc: The Date and Time of interest.

properties.name: Time Loop
properties.desc: The Time Loop controls setting the Date and Time by specified increments.

properties.name: Start Date
properties.desc: The Start Date is the beginning time of the simulation.  This value is set to the first date in the selected data component.

properties.name: End Date
properties.desc: The End Date is the end time for the simulation.  This value is set to the last date in the selected data component.

properties.name: Step Time Units
properties.desc: The Step Time Units specify the increment for advancement when stepping or running.

properties.name: Step Size
properties.desc: The Step Size value specifies a factor, along with the Step Time Units, for the increment for advancement when stepping or running.
